tbRemoveButton component in tubular.directives

The tbRemoveButton component is visual helper to show a Remove button with a popover to confirm the action.

Component's attributes

Param Type Details
model object

The row to remove.
caption string

Set the caption to use in the button, default Remove.
cancelCaption string

Set the caption to use in the Cancel button, default CAPTION_REMOVE i18n resource.
legend string

Set the legend to warn user, default UI_REMOVEROW i18n resource.
icon string

Set the CSS icon's class, the button can have only icon.
